page.title: 11A Daily Routine
page.content: On a{week day}most children get up between 7 and 7.30am and get dressed into school uniform, then they go and have their breakfast,which usually consists of cereal and toast.After breakfast they wash their faces and brush their teeth.Then they either walk or go by car to school.While they are waiting for lessons to start they wait in the playground.When they are inside they go into assembly.The school day is divided into four periods,each followed by a short break.After school some people go to clubs and after tea they usually spend most of the evening watching T.V. On{weekends}people usually get up later .Some people watch television for a small part of the day.On{Sundays some people go to church or visit friends and relations.
